channel.title: Bug on S/1999 U 2
channel.description: Recent content in Bug on S/1999 U 2

item.title: iOS 16.5 is Still Buggy
item.description: iOS 16.5 is Still Buggy After 16 years of working (more or less) flawlessly, iOS 16 breaks basic functionalities. With iOS 16.5 we’re 8 months into the iOS 16 release Screen rotation is still broken in iOS 16.5.
